title: Thirumba Thirumba Lyrics Sattam Oru Iruttarai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Thirumba Thirumba
Singers: Haricharan & Andrea
Lyrics : Na.Muthkumar
Music: Vijay Antony
Movie: Sattam Oru Irutarai

Thirumba thirumba paarthu kondaal
theeyum poovum pesi kondaal
thurathi thurathi thirudi kondaal
thigatta thigatta theendi kondaal

illai endru kangal sonaal
iruku endru idhayam sonnaal
inbamaana thunban endraal

Thirumba thirumba paarthu kondaal
theeyum poovum pesi kondaal
thurathi thurathi thirudi kondaal
thigatta thigatta theendi kondaal

Madiyil saaindhu megam paarthaal
megam vandhu madiyil saaindhaal
pookal modhi vaanam udaindhaal
boomi suttri meley parandhaal

Thirumba thirumba paarthu kondaal
theeyum poovum pesi kondaal
thurathi thurathi thirudi kondaal
thigatta thigatta theendi kondaal

Paartha paarvai podhum endraal
meendum meendum vendum endraal
Vaarthai nindru mounam vandhaal
mounam kooda pesum endraal

Thirumba thirumba paarthu kondaal
theeyum poovum pesi kondaal
thurathi thurathi thirudi kondaal
thigatta thigatta theendi kondaal..

Illai endru kangal sonaal
iruku endru idhayam sonnaal
inbamaana thunban endraal

seo.title: Thirumba Thirumba Lyrics Sattam Oru Iruttarai Songs Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Thirumba Thirumba Lyrics Sattam Oru Iruttarai Songs Lyrics from Sattam Oru Iruttarai. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Andrea Jeremiah. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Sattam Oru Iruttarai, Vijay Antony, Andrea Jeremiah, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
